channel.title: redis cluster on MMM
channel.description: Recent content in redis cluster on MMM

item.title: redis cluster 迁移
item.description: redis cluster 迁移 准备 迁移工具，redis shake – https://github.com/alibaba/RedisShake 生成dump文件 找一个机器，可以访问被迁移redis cluster 的机器 wget https://github.com/alibaba/RedisShake/releases/download/release-v2.1.1-20210903/release-v2.1.1-20210903.tar.gz tar -zxvf release-v2.1.1-20210903.tar.gz cd release-v2.1.1-20210903 修改配置，vi redis-shake.conf 1 #配置so
